extension:
membershipperiods MembershipPeriods This extension that creates a new entity (inc database schema install) for the membership period. The membership period should have a start date, end date, should be linked to a membership and it should also be possible to display a linked contribution record. AGPL-3.0 https://github.com/m-asgari/com.niktaxi.membershipperiods/archive/master.zip
Majid Asgari m.asgari@gmail.com
http://niktaxi.com http://niktaxi.com http://niktaxi.com http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.html
